name: nonentity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] disapproving a person without strong character, ideas, or influence: She was once a political nonentity, but has since won a formidable reputation as a determined campaigner.
[ U ] the fact that something or someone is not known about because of not having any strong character, ideas, or influence: This collection of essays is saved from nonentity by the stature of the contributors.

a person or thing of no importance: It’s a low-budget film full of nonentities.
